abstract: Gianluca Zambrotta (Italian pronunciation: [dʒanˈluka ddzambˈrɔtta], Ufficiale OMRI; born 19 February 1977) is a football coach and an Italian football defender, currently playing for Chiasso.He won 98 caps for the Italy national football team, playing at three World Cups, three European Championships and the 2000 Olympics. He was part of their side which won the 2006 FIFA World Cup, and was selected in the Team of the Tournament.Zambrotta was decorated as Knight of the Order of Merit of the Italian Republic (Cavaliere O.M.R.I.) in 2000 and he was made an Officer of the same order (Ufficiale O.M.R.I.) in 2006.
comment: Gianluca Zambrotta (Italian pronunciation: [dʒanˈluka ddzambˈrɔtta], Ufficiale OMRI; born 19 February 1977) is a football coach and an Italian football defender, currently playing for Chiasso.He won 98 caps for the Italy national football team, playing at three World Cups, three European Championships and the 2000 Olympics.
name: Gianluca Zambrotta
